author: bergmeister
body:
## PR Summary
Fix Start-Process whereby arguments in ArgumentList contain whitespace by quoting arguments if they contain whitespace to resolve issue #5576 
Please refer to the issue discussion that highlights it might be better to just wait for corefx to implement a new API. Maybe it is better to wait for that instead of applying this improvement (both would be a  breaking change anyway)
